name: Five Minute Farm
description:
BEST PLAYED IN FULLSCREEN

Five Minute Farm is a fast-paced game in which the player races to grow crops in an attempt to gain as much money as they can.

1. Plant, water, grow, & pick before the plant dies. If the plant dies you'll get nothing.

2. Gain points through selling crops and animal products to unlock additional store items.

3. All crops sell for twice their purchased value but keep in mind that some crops take longer to grow than others.

Good Luck & Thank You for Playing My First Game!
